simplepasteimage-warning-uncatchable: Message in console for uncatchable warnings
simplepasteimage-error-uncatchable: Message in console for uncatchable errors
simplepasteimage-notification-error-inco: Message to the user when we can't determine the extension of an image.
simplepasteimage-notification-error-unkn: Message to the user. Th name of msg key says it all (img has not been uploaded.
simplepasteimage-msg-stub: Use this key when you want to send a specific text to the user.
